mapper.select: select a.row_id as accntRowId , d.row_id as holyRowId from process.dealerholiday d join process.account a on a.row_id = d.par_row_id__c where a.dealercode__c = #{dealerCode} and d.holiday_date__c = to_date(#{holidayDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') and d.type__c = 'Dealer Local Holiday' order by d.createddate desc
mapper.insert: insert into landing.if_mntsrvc_manage_dlr_holiday ( created , created_by , last_upd , last_upd_by , source , holiday_description , holiday_date , dealer_code , operation ) VALUES ( now() , 'interface' , now() , 'interface' , #{source} , #{holidayDescription} , to_date(#{holidayDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , #{dealerCode} , #{operation} );
